channel.title: File Permissions - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: File permissions $ls -l Desktop/ drwxr-xr-x 2 pete penguins 4096 Dec 1 11:45 . Four parts to file permissions Filetype (d (for directory) in the example) a is for regular file These 3 parts are the actual file permissions. d | rwx | r-x | r-x Filetype | User Permissions | Group Permissions | Other Permissions r - readable w - writable x - executable empty Modifying Permissions $ chmod u+x myfile
